# IN PROGRESS


# ggposter

ggposter is not completed yet.


The goal of ggposter is to support making a academic poster.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ggposter from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("matutosi/ggposter")
```

## Example

There are no examples yet.

```{r example}
library(ggposter)
## basic example code
```
